quotes: Doris Leuthard (born 10 April 1963) is a Switzerland politician and lawyer.
Since 1 August 2006, she has been a member of the Swiss Federal Council, the executive authority of the Swiss Government.
From 1999 – 2006, Doris Leuthard was a member of the National Council and president of the Christian Democratic People’s Party from 2004-6.
From 1999 – 2006, Doris Leuthard was a member of the National Council and president of the Christian Democratic People’s Party from 2004-6.
She was elected to the Swiss Federal Council on 1 August 2006, and is responsible for the Doha Round negotiations of the World Trade Organization.
